description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

Instructor: Elizabeth Lin

 **_English  (for Non-English Majors)_**

Spring, 2021

**Course Description**

In this class you will increase your reading and writing skills along with listening comprehension and communication competence.

If you want to succeed in this class you need to be willing to devote time each day for additional reading. You will also need to arrive to class prepared to participate. Quality Talk (QT) is essential in class. Please do everything that takes to prepare yourself for it. Once you do so, you will be able to find that the whole language learning is fun and exciting.

  

  

**Textbook**

Reading Explorer 1 (ISBN:9780-357-123515)

  

  

**Requirements and Rules**

**Rule 1:** The success of this class is based on your active involvement in the classroom. Attendance is required. When you are in the classroom you are to be working with the entire class (your teacher and your classmates) on class related material.

**Rule 2:** NO cheating on quizzes or exams! If you get caught, you’ll get a ZERO grade on your exam.

**Rule 3:** Textbook is required! No textbook = No attendance.

**Rule 4:** Laptop or smart phone is not allowed to use in class without the teacher’s permission.

**Rule 5:** No sleeping in class.

**Rule 6:** Check your Facebook frequently. Pay attention to new posts.

**Rule 7:** No late papers.

Rule 8: No eating in class. You can eat during break time

  

  

**Grading Policies**

Group Presentation   30%

Attendance, In-class activities & participation  10%

3-Minute Presentation  20%

Final exam  40%

  

  

**Note:**

2 lateness = 1 absence

1 absence = minus 10 points from final grade

2 absences = minus 20 points from final grade

3 absences = minus 30 points from final grade

If you are absent due to illness or any other important issue (i.e. family issue), please e-mail me at least 24 hours before class meeting. My e-mail address is drlinelizabeth76@yahoo.com
